docs.snippet: In a game played in the rough-and-tumble style favored by Bulls Coach Tom Thibodeau, the Nets were outrebounded, 45-27, and had no effective response to Chicago’s physical presence....

docs.abstract: New York Knicks face delicate contract negotiations with Carmelo Anthony, who has most of the leverage as his free agency approaches; with February 20 trade deadline looming, Knicks have decisions to make, but they have given absolutely no indication they would consider dealing Anthony before deadline.
